data.description: Uta and the others receive a fan letter from a sumo wrestler they’ve met before, Kurikyuta. But when they reunite, Kurikyuta says he’s going to quit sumo and join Idol Precure.
data.title: Dosukoi! An Idol Debut?
A River That Cannot Be Crossed

episode_metadata.season_title: With You and the Rain (English Dub)

data.description: Fuji reaches out to Ren for support as she struggles with writer's block.

data.title: Has the Real Prince Come at Last...?
data.description: Enter Jonas, enter Prince Charming, enter Christine.

data.title: My World Has Tumbled Into Pieces
data.description: Relationships are adjusted, Gilbert speaks, and spring and Anne return to Green Gables.
Relationships are adjusted, Gilbert speaks, and spring and Anne return to Green Gables.
data.title: My World Has Tumbled Into Pieces

data.description:
Sakuta dreams that on Christmas Eve, when he is meant to have a sleepover date with Mai, he instead goes on a date with a student named Sara Himeji from the cram school where he works. The Sara in question has the same dream as Sakuta and goes on to confess that she has her own Puberty Syndrome. However, she says that she does not want her Puberty Syndrome to be fixed. Sara developed Puberty Syndrome after a heartbreak, and the symptoms of her syndrome ease her anxiety by making her popular with guys, which she has been enjoying.

Sakuta warns her that this is a dangerous move. To which she retorts to provoke him, “What should I do so that I can love people. Like you do, Mr. Sakuta?”

episode_metadata.season_title: Rascal Does Not Dream of Santa Claus (English Dub)
episode_metadata.series_title: Rascal Does Not Dream of Bunny Girl Senpai

data.title: I Need You

data.description: Sakuta from the other possible realm sends a message through Ikumi that reads, “Find Touko Kirishima, Mai-san is in danger.” After seeing this message, he tries contacting the Miniskirt Santa, who claimed to be Touko Kirishima. A few days later, he receives a call from her saying that she can meet on December 2nd… which also happens to be Mai’s birthday.
data.title: Secrets and Promises

Dear My Dress-Up Darling
data.description: Marin, Wakana, and the others finally have their "Coffin" group cosplay session.

Mai responds to the media, asserting that she is not the real identity of Touko Kirishima on Coming of Age Day. Nevertheless, the impact of the #DREAMING tag on the public discourse was immense, rendering her unable to dispel the rumors completely. By having Mai herself publicly state that she is not Touko Kirishima, Sakuta has fulfilled his promise with the Miniskirt Santa, and the two of them go out on a date.

During the date, as they shop in Motomachi, but there is not a single person who is able to perceive the Miniskirt Santa. In an attempt to find out more about her, Sakuta ends up hearing an unexpected name. The person she dated back in high school was…

The Hero of Ishinomaki
data.description: The Detective Boys go to Miyagi Prefecture to film an episode of Kamen Yaiba.
Kaito and Misaki face off in a final showdown with only minutes left until the BHB rocket is launched.
data.title: Now It's Time for OUR Game

data.description: Working through the night, the Robot Research Club members and the throngs of volunteers finish modifying GunBuild-1 before the Black Hole Bomb can be launched. The club members also devise a number of strategies for the upcoming final battle.
data.title: GUNVARREL, Forward!

data.description: With five billion lives at stake, Akiho declares that she WILL defeat Kou Kimijima! The question is... how?
data.title: Does She Still Like Robots?
I Never Should've Had a Dream
data.description: Chaos erupts at the Robot Expo as Misaki starts destroying robots left and right. Meanwhile, slowly, but surely, Kaito begins to learn the truth behind everything.

data.title: The Real GUNVARREL is Standing Right There
data.description: At last, the big robot expo in Tokyo gets underway! The diminished Robot Research Club finally gets to show off its robot, and Akiho finally gets the chance to see her sister again.

data.title: The Robot Research Club is Hereby Disbanded!
data.description: After the accident with GunBuild-2, the school's vice principal shuts down the Robot Research Club for good and orders that all of the club's robots be dismantled.
The Robot Research Club's newest giant robot, GunBuild-2, is finally complete! Meanwhile, both Exoskeleton Co. and Mizuka catch wind of Kaito's activities surrounding Kou Kimijima.
data.title: I Love Giant Robots

data.description: Airi finds her existence threatened when major maintenance is scheduled for the IRUO. server. While Airi clings to the hope of a snowy miracle, Kaito learns more about her past.
data.title: I'll Let You Dream

data.description: After a solar storm knocks out power all over Tokyo, robots throughout the city run berserk and attack! Now it's up to Kaito to shut down the robots and save the entire Tokyo metropolitan area somehow...
data.title: Let's Stay Like This for a Bit...
What a Screwed-Up World
data.description: Experiments with the magnetic monopole get underway, and more information from the Kimijima Reports comes to light. Details about an impending solar storm are revealed... along with a warning of a robot uprising.

The Robot Research Club is shocked to hear that not only has Doc been rushed to the hospital, but he's also considering closing his shop. Junna tries to encourage him to keep the shop open, but her fear of robots makes it difficult.
data.title: Until You Like SOMETHING About Them

data.description: Kaito and Frau team up to locate Kimijima Report No. 3, but it won't be any easier than last time. Meanwhile, the final, unaired episode of GUNVARREL is leaked online...
data.title: The Flag Has Been Cleared

data.description: After the outcome of the GunBuild-1 start-up test, Subaru tries to convince Akiho to build a new robot from scratch. Meanwhile, Kai unexpectedly makes the discovery of the century...
data.title: A Robot that Only We Can Build
Because It's the Product of Our Blood, Sweat, and Tears
data.description: At long last, the Robot Research Club completes its giant GunBuild-1 robot! And, as people from all over the island watch, the robot takes its historic first step!
Akiho is elated when a grown-up Nae Tennoji offers to help the Robot Research Club build a giant robot. Meanwhile, Kaito is caught in a typhoon while searching for the elusive Kimijima Report No. 2.
data.title: I'm Nae Tennoji! Nice to Meet You!
Thank You Berry Much
data.description: While Kaito and friends encounter more mysterious phenomena, another solar storm suddenly hits the Earth. Meanwhile, Akiho gets the GunBuild-1 project funded and rolling full-steam ahead!
Subaru and Kaito start practicing for the upcoming ROBO-ONE world tournament in Las Vegas. During his off-time, Kaito stumbles upon a mysterious room inside the abandoned folk museum.
data.title: It'd Be Sad to Have a Dream End
May I Call You
data.description: Kaito and Junna set out to investigate the strange "ghost" that Kaito caught a glimpse of... but only succeed in discovering more mysteries.

data.title: Let's Build a Giant Robot of Justice Together
data.description: Subaru seeks Kaito's help for the upcoming ROBO-ONE World Championship in Las Vegas. Meanwhile, Akiho struggles to keep the club funded while Kaito reflects on a life-changing incident.

data.title: Tanegashi Accel Impaaaact!
data.description: At last, the Robot Research Club enters the ROBO-ONE tournament! The revolutionary KILL-BALLAD control scheme makes Kaito a force to be reckoned with, but will it be enough to win the tournament and save the club?
The Robot Research Club is going to be shut down unless it can win the upcoming ROBO-ONE tournament. Akiho and Kaito have to somehow find a hobby robot and master its controls in only two weeks.
data.title: Because of Dreams, Hopes, and Passion
Because GUNVARREL is Waiting
data.description: The Robot Research Club is in dire straits - there are only two members and the future of the club is in jeopardy. Despite this, the club's leader, Akiho, is intent on building a life-sized robot based on her favorite anime, GUNVARREL!
Kaito and Misaki face off in a final showdown with only minutes left until the BHB rocket is launched.
